names.english: dispel wind and relieve pain decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, stops pain due to Blood Stasis and regulates the menses.
With Fang Feng, for numbness in the legs.
Releases the exterior, expels External Wind, expels Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
Releases the exterior and expels Wind.
With Fang Feng, for Exterior Excess.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens the Yang and Ming Men Fire, disperses deep Cold, warms and unblocks the channels and vessels and alleviates pain.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

syndromes: Wind-Cold With Cold in the Liver channel

symptoms: No inflammation or redness or burning
Pain on copulation with spastic penis or vagina which is aggravated by exposure to Cold
A cold sensation in the lower abdomen or
A contracted scrotum with a cold sensation
Cough with expectoration of thin, watery or frothy white sputum
Blocked and/or runny nose with clear, watery nasal discharge
